heisig_chinese_memo: Time and again you will see the flying dutchman flag pass by but you'll never get close enough to see what's on the ship.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A bride woman walking around waving an American flag probably sleeps with foreigners time and again.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " corpse " to " lou " sound. The original meaning is several times, many times. "Shuowen Xinfu": "If you repeat, count." Such as "Poetry. Xiaoya. "Bin Zhi Chu Banquet": "Sit and move, and dance the immortals." Mao Chuan: "If you repeat, count." "Han Shu. "The Five Elements": "The fire in "Spring and Autumn" is repeated between calmness and sorrow. Without saints and indulging in arrogant officials, the country will be subjugated, and it is unknown."

" Repeat " also means haste. "Er Ya. "Explanation": "Repeat, disease also." Such as "Book of Rites. "Le Records": "When things happen repeatedly, you are brave; you see profit and let go, and you are righteous." Eastern Han Dynasty King Can <Liu Fu>: "If you go far away and retreat, you will not be too late."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " corpse " and " lou ". The original meaning is several times, many times.
humanum_full_description:
從「尸」，「婁」聲。本義是數次、多次。《說文新附》：「屢，數也。」如《詩．小雅．賓之初筵》：「舍其坐遷，屢舞僊僊。」毛傳：「屢，數也。」《漢書．五行志》：「《春秋》火災，屢於定、哀之間，不用聖人而縱驕臣，將以亡國，不明甚也。」

　　「屢」也表示急速。《爾雅．釋詁》：「屢，疾也。」如《禮記．樂記》：「臨事而屢斷，勇也；見利而讓，義也。」東漢王粲〈柳賦〉：「苟遠跡而退之，豈駕遲而不屢。」
humanum_short_description: 從「尸」，「婁」聲。本義是數次、多次。

從「 尸 」，「 婁 」聲。本義是數次、多次。《說文新附》：「屢，數也。」如《詩．小雅．賓之初筵》：「舍其坐遷，屢舞僊僊。」毛傳：「屢，數也。」《漢書．五行志》：「《春秋》火災，屢於定、哀之間，不用聖人而縱驕臣，將以亡國，不明甚也。」 「 屢 」也表示急速。《爾雅．釋詁》：「屢，疾也。」如《禮記．樂記》：「臨事而屢斷，勇也；見利而讓，義也。」東漢王粲〈柳賦〉：「苟遠跡而退之，豈駕遲而不屢。」
From " corpse" to " lou" sound. The original meaning is several times, many times. "Shuowen Xinfu": "If you repeat, count." Such as "Poetry. Xiaoya. "Bin Zhi Chu Banquet": "Sit and move, and dance the immortals." Mao Chuan: "If you repeat, count." "Han Shu. "The Five Elements": "The fire in "Spring and Autumn" is repeated between calmness and sorrow. Without saints and indulging in arrogant officials, the country will be subjugated, and it is unknown." " Repeat" also means haste. "Er Ya. "Explanation": "Repeat, disease also." Such as "Book of Rites. "Le Records": "When things happen repeatedly, you are brave; you see profit and let go, and you are righteous." Eastern Han Dynasty King Can : "If you go far away and retreat, you will not be too late."

屢字的基本解释

屢
lǚ
见“屡”。

屢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bù］
［《廣韻》分勿切，入物，非。］
(1)无，没有。
(2)非，不是。
(3)不到，未。
(4)副词。表否定。
(5)副词。表禁止。勿，不要。
(6)副词。单用，做否定性的回答。
(7)副词。方言。用在句末表示疑问，跟反复问句的作用相等。
(8)副词。用在动补结构中间，表示不可能达到某种结果。
(9)副词。“不”字的前后叠用相同的名词，表示不在乎或不相干。
(10)副词。跟“便”“就”搭用，表示选择。
(11)副词。方言。不用；不要（限用于某些套语）。
(12)助词。无义。用以足句或加强语气。
(13)助词。无义。表示反问语气。
(14)通“丕”。大。
[②]［fǒu］
［《廣韻》方久切，上有，非。］
同“否1”。
[③]［fōu］
［《廣韻》甫鳩切，平尤，非。］
姓。汉有不疑。见《後汉书·皇甫规传》。
[④]［fū］
［《集韻》風無切，平虞，非。］
花蒂。
[⑤]［pǐ］
［《韻补》補美切，上紙］
通“否2”。<

repeatedly
Basic explanation of words
repeatedly
lǚ

repeatedly
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bù］
["Guangyun" is divided into do not cut, into things, not. ]
(1) No, no.
(2) No, no.
(3) No, no.
(4) Adverbs. Table negation.
(5) Adverbs. Table prohibited. Don't, don't.
(6) Adverbs. Use it alone to make a negative answer.
(7) Adverbs. dialect. Used at the end of a sentence to express a question, it is equivalent to a repeated question.
(8) Adverbs. Used in the middle of the dynamic compensation structure, it means that it is impossible to achieve a certain result.
(9) Adverbs. The same nouns are used before and after the word "bu", which means that they don't care or are irrelevant.
(10) Adverbs. Used with "convenience" and "just" to indicate choice.
(11) Adverbs. dialect. No; don't (limited to certain phrases).
(12) Particles. Meaningless. Use full sentences or to strengthen the tone.
(13) Particles. Meaningless. Indicates a rhetorical tone.
(14) Link "Pi". Big.
[②]［fǒu］
["Guangyun" Fang Jiu cut, there is no. ]
Same as "No 1".
[③] [fōu]
["Guangyun" Fu Jiuqie, Pingyou, Fei. ]
name. Han has no doubts. See "Book of the Later Han·Huangfu Rules Biography".
[④]［fū］
["Jiyun" wind is not cut, Pingyu, non. ]
Flower pedicle.
[⑤] [pǐ]
["Yunbu" to make up the beauty and cut, put on paper]
Pass "No 2".
